snippet: A separate survey showed signs of life in the beaten-down manufacturing sector. Banks shares, and big names in technology climbed, as did oil prices.
abstract: Stock markets have their best day in more than a month, in wake of encouraging signs about strength of United States economy.
lead_paragraph: A separate survey showed signs of life in the beaten-down manufacturing sector. Banks shares, and big names in technology climbed, as did oil prices.

headline.main: Best Day in Over a Month for Wall St., With Banks Leading the Way
headline.print_headline: ­Best Day in Over a Month for Wall St., With Banks Leading the Way
